NAME: buy
DESCRIPTION: Allows you to buy an item from the shop.
OPTION_ITEM_DESCRIPTION: The name of the item you want to buy
NO_STOCK: There is no stock of that item.
MAX_ALLOWED: You can only buy {{maxAllowed}} of that item.
ROLE_NOT_FOUND: The role linked to this item could not be found.
ROLE_HIGHER: The role linked to this item is higher than my highest role.
NOT_ENOUGH_MONEY: You do not have enough money to buy that item.
